text:
@realDonaldTrump We plan on transitioning to Joe Biden - 
he will be a great President 

Look on the bright side 
You can golf all you want
And never have to give another thought about the 100,000 Americans who died from Covid19 on your watch. 

You are responsible - it goes with the job ---
